meanings.definition: Behaving in a fair and honorable manner in sports or games.
meanings.sent1: He always plays sportsmanly and never cheats.
meanings.sent2: The team captain commended his sportsmanly conduct on the field.
meanings.sent3: Even in a friendly game, he remains sportsmanly and follows the rules.
meanings.sent4: His sportsmanly behavior sets a positive example for the younger players.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered for his sportsmanly attitude towards the opponent.

meanings.definition: In a manner befitting a sportsman.
meanings.sent1: He competed sportsmanly in the tournament.
meanings.sent2: She accepted the defeat sportsmanly and congratulated the winner.
meanings.sent3: He smiled sportsmanly as he crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: She waved sportsmanly to the audience after the match.
meanings.sent5: He nodded sportsmanly at his opponent before the game started.

meanings.sent1: His sportsmanly spirit inspired the team to give their best.
meanings.sent2: The coach praised his sportsmanly attitude towards both victory and defeat.
meanings.sent3: He wore a sportsmanly smile as he accepted the trophy.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's sportsmanly conduct earned him respect from his peers.
meanings.sent5: Her sportsmanly behavior made her a role model for younger athletes.
